page.title: 15Child's Music- Boars Hill
page.content: My favourite music is played by a pop group called SISTER SLEDGE. I like them because they don't sing rubbish. There are four in the group, they wear very fashionable clothes. One lady has very long black hair, she wears black trousers with a white flimsy dress over them. The others wear black or yellow trousers with flowery blouses. Sometimes they wear yellow coats. At the moment they are singing a song I like called "Frankie". I watch "Top of the Pops" on television every week to see what the favourite song of the week is. I have a cassette player on which I listen to pop music, usually in my bedroom because my mum does not like pop music.
